title: Senior OT Security Consultant
aboutRole: As a Senior OT Security Consultant at Cyraf, you will be a trusted advisor to our clients, helping them navigate the complex landscape of industrial cybersecurity. You will lead assessments, design robust security architectures, and develop strategies to protect critical infrastructure against sophisticated cyber threats. This role requires a deep understanding of both operational technology (OT) environments and cybersecurity principles.
responsibilities: Lead cybersecurity risk assessments for OT and ICS environments based on standards like ISA/IEC 62443.
Design and implement security architectures for industrial networks, including network segmentation, firewalls, and intrusion detection systems.
Develop and deliver security strategies, policies, and procedures tailored to client needs.
Serve as a subject matter expert on OT security, providing guidance to both clients and internal teams.
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing on industrial control systems.
Stay current with the latest OT security threats, vulnerabilities, and mitigation techniques.
requiredQualifications: 5+ years of experience in cybersecurity, with at least 3 years focused on OT/ICS environments.
In-depth knowledge of industrial control systems (e.g., SCADA, DCS, PLCs) and industrial protocols (e.g., Modbus, DNP3, OPC).
Proven experience with network security architecture and technologies in an industrial context.
Strong understanding of standards such as ISA/IEC 62443, NIST Cybersecurity Framework, and NERC CIP.
Excellent communication and client-facing skills.
preferredQualifications: Professional certifications such as GICSP, GRID, or CISSP.
Experience in critical infrastructure sectors like energy, transportation, or manufacturing.
Hands-on experience with OT security tools and platforms.
Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or a related field.
whatWeOffer: A competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
Flexible remote work options.
A budget for professional development and certifications.
The opportunity to work on challenging projects with a significant real-world impact.
A collaborative and supportive team environment where your expertise is valued.
